mng: mother, elderly female relative, origin, source, (of animals) female

exm.mng: (zoology, medicine) mother's body, (chemistry etc) parent, matrix, (statistics) population, parent population
consonant, the initial consonant (of a Chinese syllable)
native language, mother tongue, (linguistics) parent language
aunt, wife of father's younger brother
mother and child, parent and subsidiary (companies), principal and interest
